name: typified
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
typify
Something that typifies a particular group of things shows all the characteristics that you would usually expect from it: With his blond, blue-eyed athletic looks, he typifies the all-American boy next door.
to be characteristic of something: His latest book reflects the old preoccupations with sex and religion that typify much of his work.
